query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS conversation_participants (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  conversationId INT NOT NULL,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  joinedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  leftAt TIMESTAMP,
  lastReadAt TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX part_conversation_idx (conversationId),
  INDEX part_user_idx (userId),
  UNIQUE INDEX part_conv_user_idx (conversationId, userId)
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user UqERVjVAX9eY9W2.dc0a0a76636f --database 5L3gkWSwSgtAn7Y93vysCU --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS conversation_participants (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  conversationId INT NOT NULL,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  joinedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  leftAt TIMESTAMP,
  lastReadAt TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX part_conversation_idx (conversationId),
  INDEX part_user_idx (userId),
  UNIQUE INDEX part_conv_user_idx (conversationId, userId)
);
